name: Piggy Rescue
description: When a young dryad enlists their help, Damian and Mr. Piggles go on an quest to find the Big Wubba Piggy's missing friends, who were swept away by a tornado. In their quest, they ride a trusty hot air balloon to new locations, and race through side-scrolling, monster-infested levels. But can they find all the missing piggies?
